title: Those new SKT Skins
body:
I have to tell you, I really like them. Some of the better team skins I've seen overall. And +1 to SKT for strong-arming Riot into making a Zac skin.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DB5YSSMUQAEd8qT.jpg

replies.body: One day faker will get his desired SKT Ahri skin
I don't know the backstory here. Why doesn't he have one already?
